content: peggotty is a fun and super quick to knit hat worked in two colours using only simple stitches pattern has both written and charted instructions **materials ** bulky weight yarn mc 75 95 115 yds / 69 87 105 m cc 55 70 85 yds / 50 64 78 m 5mm / us8 16 / 40cm circular needles plus dpns **finished measurements ** to fit head circumference 16-18 19-21 22-24 / 40-46 48-53 55-61 cm
